00001 <?php
00002 
00003 ns::import('hygia.libs.plugin.Plugin');
00004 ns::import('hygia.libs.exception.PluginException');
00005 ns::import('hygia.libs.io.Request');
00006 
00007 class XmlSetTime extends Plugin implements IInputPlugin {
00008 
00009     public function run(Request $oRequest) {
00010         $oXml = simplexml_load_string($oRequest->getBody());
00011         if (!empty($oXml)) {
00012             $oXml->LocalTime = date('Y-m-d\TH:i:s'); // eg: 2006-02-17T14:41:09
00013             $oRequest->setBody($oXml->asXML());
00014         } else {
00015             throw new PluginException('Unable to load XML');
00016         }
00017         return $oRequest;
00018     }
00019 
00020 }
00021 
00022 ?>
